column5: `BloomingLeaf is a tool that allows stakeholders to visualize their goals and tradeoffs in the situation using Tropos goal models.`

column3: Discover the purpose of your analysis
column5:
`BloomingLeaf allows a user to ask and answer questions about a given situation. Here are some examples:
  • Does it matter if Goal A or Goal B is satisfied first?
  • Is Goal A or Goal B satisfied more often?
  • Given that Task A is not currently satisfied
column6:
is it possible for Goal B to become satisfied?
  • Can Goal A remain satisfied if Goal B becomes not satisfed?
    • `
